column1: Table 5.11: Tentative estimates for the rehabilitation of Amunukura Wewa

column2: Removing silt from tank bed depth up to 9\-18\""

Vegetative cover improving with Areca nut seedling @ 1.5m spacing in a single row, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and dense planting at 500mm grid interval, applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer, mulching with straw/ banana tree skin and maintenance
Earth excavation from borrow area by Backhoe and forming tank bund including transporting, placing (150-225) mm  layers, watering, compacting and trimming  as per instructions (haulage up to 01 km)
Minor repairs to the Sluice & Spill
